FORM_RADIO_ERROR_MODAL.LABEL: Trial Eligibility
FORM_RADIO_ERROR_MODAL.HEADER: Congratulations, you are eligible for a SiriusXM Streaming trial!
FORM_RADIO_ERROR_MODAL.COPY: Please continue to activate your trial and start listening.
FORM_RADIO_ERROR_MODAL.SMALL_COPY: Note: This does not include in-vehicle satellite radio service.

promoCodeValidationComponent.TITLE: Enter your promo code to receive a special streaming offer.
